entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
